snippet.title: Wildaria - Gameplay Trailer (An Infinite Open World RPG)
snippet.description:
WISHLIST on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1965550/Wildaria/
^^ Wishlist or play demo now! ^^

Wildaria is an Action-Adventure RPG set in an Infinite Fantasy World. Explore the rich, living, procedurally-generated Open World encountering randomly generated quests, fast-paced combat, loot, dungeons, pets, and more.

Play demo on Itch.io: https://spacefudge.itch.io/wildaria
Music by Strikcast Audio: http://strikecastaudio.com/

FOR MORE GAMEDEV UPDATES FOLLOW:
Discord: https://discord.gg/6ZTjfKuB5R
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/spacefudge/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/fudge_space
Itch: https://spacefudge.itch.io/

#indiegame #rpg #trailer
